title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) for the purpose of: giving
heading: In these Regulations, the “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, the “Principal Regulations” means the European 
Communities (Greenhouse Gas Emissions Trading) (Aviation) Regulations 
2024 (S.I. No. 471 of 2024). 

Amendment of Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean european community (greenhouse gas emission trading) (aviation) regulation 2024 (s.i no 471 2024) amendment regulation 9 principal regulation

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) for the purpose of: giving
heading: 3. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of 

the following paragraph after paragraph (5): 

“(6) In specific circumstances where an aircraft operator operates on a very 
limited number of aerodrome pairs or on a very limited number of State pairs 
that are subject to offsetting requirements or on a very limited number of State 
pairs that are not subject to offsetting requirements, that aircraft operator may 
request the Agency not to publish such data at the aircraft operator level, 
explaining why disclosure would be considered to harm its commercial interests. 
Based on that request, the Agency may request the Commission to publish those 
data at a higher level of aggregation in accordance with Article 14(6) of the 
Directive.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 December, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
